channel.title: I Find It Ironic
channel.description: I find it ironic I can trust cheaters/hackers on this site more than I can trust the "honest" people in runescape. lol.

item.title: I Find It Ironic
item.dc:creator: @Areithe Areithe
item.description:
@Areithe wrote:

[quote=“therealjdb, post:22, topic:45477”]…Wow someone comes here and compliments you/us and you flame the fuck out of him…what the hell is your problem?..

Hi Areithe :P[/quote]

Ya, theres some really kind people here, and some boorish ones.

P.S
Hi jdb! =D

Read full topic

item.title: I Find It Ironic
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Heh, I find every post in this topic ironic. Contrary to what Taharok mentioned, Moparisthebest.com will always be more then moparisthebest.com solely because we can actual get out points across ‘witout spe3kin lyk d1s l0zl’.
That, and people on moparisthebest.com do nothing but spam. You can’t say that we’re horrible spammers Taharok… I’m sure you haven’t had a single day where you haven’t had to lock less then 10 posts. No offense, but it was silly to suggest that place may be better. -.-

Read full topic

item.title: I Find It Ironic
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“mod taharok, post:6, topic:45477”]Omfg, Moparisthebest.com starts to sicken me. Sometimes I find people on MoparScape.org more considerate then you people. All you do is sit around spamming and flaming each other and then give everyone on MoparScape.org a bad name. You cannot judge MoparScape.org unless you actually go there.

P.S. IcyPimp, it is spelled ‘knowledge’.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: I Find It Ironic
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Areithe:

Icypimp, whats your problem? I was just complimenting the community here, and you start flaming me.

Because you’re one of those addicted-to-RuneScape-fanboys.

[quote=“Aftermath_96, post:11, topic:45477”][quote author=mod taharok link=topic=63226.msg749611#msg749611 date=1168229135]
Omfg, Moparisthebest.com starts to sicken me. Sometimes I find people on MoparScape.org more considerate then you people. All you do is sit around spamming and flaming each other and then give everyone on MoparScape.org a bad name. You cannot judge MoparScape.org unless you actually go there.

P.S. IcyPimp, it is spelled ‘knowledge’.
[/quote]

Moparisthebest > moparisthebest.com.
Notice I even wrote it with a lowercase letter.
By the way, it’s ‘is starting to.’
l2English.[/quote]
/agreed

Read full topic

item.title: I Find It Ironic
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[quote=“IcyPimp, post:8, topic:45477”][quote author=mod taharok link=topic=63226.msg749611#msg749611 date=1168229135]
Omfg, Moparisthebest.com starts to sicken me. Sometimes I find people on MoparScape.org more considerate then you people. All you do is sit around spamming and flaming each other and then give everyone on MoparScape.org a bad name. You cannot judge MoparScape.org unless you actually go there.

P.S. IcyPimp, it is spelled ‘knowledge’.
[/quote]

Are you seriously that much of a dumbass?

I find it Ironic you play Runescape and have a “Knowleage” of Cheaters.

lawl u spelt kwnolege rong!!!1

[serious]
Erm…Yeah. I advise you shoot yourself before you play RuneScape any longer.
[/serious]

I advise you to shut your mouth. He’s complimenting the community, it’s better then all of the other crap you ever here about.

I don’t know what “crap you here” about, but this is spam to me.[/quote]Just shut up.

Read full topic
